cab.content: 1 'el ftMilitary Secret.3*1253From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,(Jth January 1920.(Received 12th.)299. 9th January. Malleson wires Cth' January :-The Bolsheviks in Merv statethat a German General with a detachment of Germans (probably officers) has arrivedat Tashkent.2. Exrz (corrupt group) deserter from Bolsheviks, who reached Bajgiram on 6thJanuary, reports Bolshevik strength in Askabad area as 20,000. A steady stream of reinforcements is arriving from the centre. Zinoieff, prominent Bolshevik of Moscow,reported arrived at Askabad end of December.(9
